Messages.Author: Georg Eberhard Ernst Hans Bolko Heinemann
Messages.Content: Dear all, I have just updated the ISIS repository. Regarding your term paper, please see the last three items at the very bottom. There you find all the resources you need: ~ Introduction to Scientific Writing including the term paper template you are supposed to use ~ Methodological approach: System Good - Organizational Model Framework ~ Methodological approach: Triple Embeddedness Framework You may choose between the system good or the triple embeddedness framework approach as methodology for your term paper. Best, Georg

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Reminder and details: this friday, May 17th, 2pm seminar

Messages.Author: Georg Eberhard Ernst Hans Bolko Heinemann
Messages.Content: Dear students, please allow me to remember you for our upcoming session this week: Date: May 17th, 2024 Time: 2pm Agenda: ~ 14:00 Welcome & Anecdotes ~ 14:10 Presentation Charles Muchunku (Phd mock defense) Phd Title: Reorienting and Recreating Firms in the Electrification Industry to Achieve Universal Electricity Access Phd Abstract: The dissertation explores the multifaceted approach to electrification in East Africa, analyzing both off-grid and on-grid solutions through public-private partnerships. It highlights the need for increased private sector involvement and reduced burdens on national utilities. The dissertation includes a systems analysis of business models in East Africa, identifying the effectiveness of various approaches and proposing practical interventions and frameworks to transition solar home systems from niche to mainstream, aiming to guide Kenya's long-term energy planning and electrification efforts.  ~ subsequently: Q&A *** Zoom meeting details:  https://tu-berlin.zoom.us/j/69049204065?pwd=cE14TDhlVGlmeXB5VjZKYkpYVDR1UT09   Meeting-ID: 690 4920 4065 Kenncode: 193225 Schnelleinwahl mobil +496971049922,,69049204065#,,,,,,0#,,193225# Deutschland +496950502596,,69049204065#,,,,,,0#,,193225# Deutschland   Einwahl nach aktuellem Standort         +49 69 7104 9922 Deutschland         +49 695 050 2596 Deutschland Meeting-ID: 690 4920 4065 Kenncode: 193225 Ortseinwahl suchen: https://tu-berlin.zoom.us/u/cnpedlxhS   Über SIP beitreten sip:69049204065.193225@fr.zmeu.us   Über H.323 beitreten 213.19.144.110 (Amsterdam  Niederlande) 213.244.140.110 (Deutschland) Kenncode: 193225 Meeting-ID: 690 4920 4065

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Reminder and details: this Friday 26th, 2pm - kick-off

Messages.Author: Georg Eberhard Ernst Hans Bolko Heinemann
Messages.Content: Dear all, This is a friendly reminder that our course begins this week. Please take a moment to review the literature uploaded on this site in advance. Additionally, we will kick off with presentations from last semester's seminar papers. This provides an excellent opportunity for you to familiarize yourself with the scope of our topics and content. After these presentations, we'll have time to address any questions and discuss the outline of this semester's seminar. Looking forward to a productive and engaging session! Best regards, ME-SY team  *** AGENDA: 14:00 Welcome & Short introduction 14:10 – 14:30 Hendrik Wieschiolek : Comparison of energy communities regarding financing and legal structure based on an analysis of best practice examples from Schleswig-Holstein. 14:30 – 14:50 Julia Gattner et al.: Exploring organizational models and financial structures for the establishment of heat cooperatives: recommendations and insights from Germany. 14:50 *** short coffee break *** 15:00 – 15:20 Nick Mörle, Ana Maria Quintero, Sofia Velosa Herran: Examining the Institutional Economic Framework: Financing Strategies for Energy Communities in Colombia. 15:20 – 15:40 Thomas Patrick, Paul Jannaschk, Sophia König: Energy Communities in Colombia: Modelling and Analyzing microgrids for energy communities. 15:40 Wrap-up & closing *** MEETING DETAILS: Zoom: https://tu-berlin.zoom.us/j/61284991524?pwd=NTBST1RaNEFtdUZ3RmZLZHhIMGMzZz09
